price: 18. Hubaal Alle baa ogsoon waxa aan muuqan ee ah samooyinka iyo arlada. Alle wuu Arkaa waxaad fashaan.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu ghayba al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā taʿmalūna
